attributes.action: make Jose Mourihno Head coach of England Football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of England's precarious positon of qualifying for the European Championship 2008, we feel that England deserve a poven manager, Steve Mclaren is both inexperienced and incapable, the English natinal team deserves more.Furthermore, we demand Mr. Mourinho return to England to capture the mood of the nation and spearhead Englands's rebellion against continuing underachievement.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
